item.description:
On Saturday, August 4th, 10 AM we will all
convene at Hampton Beach to Paint the SKY Ron!
Let's have some fun! All you have to do between
now and then is to come up with a clever way to
get Ron Paul's name high above the sunbathing
masses. I suggest kites, but you might consider
some sort of helium balloons with Ron Paul signs
attached or suspended.

Hint: if you don't want to make a kite,
you could paint your "Ron Paul" message
on a ready made kite. Bigger is better!

Be sure to bring lots of literature. There will
be plenty of curious voters!

This event will only be successful with LOTS
of enthusiastic participation. Can you just
picture 100 or more of us doing this? Invite friends
and family to make or paint their own kites and join
us. This is going to make a GREAT You Tube Video!
Don't be left out!

RSVP and get on board for a fun day at the
beach! Rain Date will be Sunday, August 5th.

Let's launch this campaign into the stratosphere!

Contact Linda for more info: linda.lagana@comcast.net
item.name: Paint the Sky Ron! Hampton Beach, N.H.
